metadata.Title: CVE-2023-37454 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 6.4.2. A crafted UDF filesystem image causes a use-after-free write operation in the udf_put_super and udf_close_lvid functions in fs/udf/super.c.

notes.Note: sbeattie> according to upstream, this is syzkaller corrupting a mounted loopback device by writing directly to the device while it's mounted. Upstream is unlikely to fix this, other than by having the fuzzer not do that.

criterions.comment: linux package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
